ai:cl.c: Manages the loading of system libraries.

ai:m.c: Resolves library symbol names to their address pointers.
ai:m.p: ERR mod::ResolveSymbol(OBJECTPTR Object, CSTRING Name, APTR * Address)

ai:i.c: The name of the symbol to resolve.
The address of the symbol will be returned in this parameter.

ai:f.c: Refers to a list of public functions exported by the module.
The Module's function base (jump table) must be read from this field.
